stages.name: Initialize Next.js 15 Foundation
stages.instructions: Create new Next.js 15 project with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and essential modern tooling setup

ai_prompts.cursor_nextjs_setup:
Create Next.js 15 project with optimal configuration:

```bash
# Verify Node.js version
node --version  # Should be 20+

# Create Next.js 15 project
npx create-next-app@latest react-migration-nextjs15 \
  --typescript \
  --tailwind \
  --eslint \
  --app \
  --src-dir \
  --import-alias '@/*' \
  --use-npm

cd react-migration-nextjs15

# Verify Next.js 15 installation
npm list next
```

Validate project structure:
- src/app directory (App Router)
- tailwind.config.ts configuration
- tsconfig.json with path mapping
- package.json with Next.js 15
ai_prompts.cursor_typescript_config:
Configure TypeScript with strict settings:

```json
// tsconfig.json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2022",
    "lib": ["dom", "dom.iterable", "es2022"],
    "allowJs": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "strict": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "module": "esnext",
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "jsx": "preserve",
    "incremental": true,
    "plugins": [{ "name": "next" }],
    "baseUrl": ".",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["./src/*"]
    }
  }
}
```

stages.name: Development Toolchain & Quality Setup
stages.instructions: Configure comprehensive development toolchain with ESLint, Prettier, Husky pre-commit hooks, and TypeScript strict mode for code quality enforcement

ai_prompts.cursor_eslint_setup:
Configure ESLint for Next.js 15 with TypeScript:

```bash
# Install ESLint dependencies
npm install --save-dev \
  @typescript-eslint/parser \
  @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin \
  eslint-config-next \
  eslint-plugin-react-hooks \
  eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y

# Create .eslintrc.json
cat > .eslintrc.json << 'EOF'
{
  "extends": [
    "next/core-web-vitals",
    "@typescript-eslint/recommended",
    "plugin:jsx-a11y/recommended"
  ],
  "rules": {
    "@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars": "error",
    "@typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-type": "warn"
  }
}
EOF
```
ai_prompts.cursor_prettier_husky:
Set up Prettier and Husky for code formatting:

```bash
# Install Prettier and Husky
npm install --save-dev prettier husky lint-staged

# Create .prettierrc
echo '{
  "semi": true,
  "trailingComma": "es5",
  "singleQuote": true,
  "printWidth": 100
}' > .prettierrc

# Initialize Husky
npx husky install
npx husky add .husky/pre-commit "npx lint-staged"

# Configure lint-staged in package.json
npm pkg set lint-staged."*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx}"="["eslint --fix", "prettier --write"]"
```

stages.name: AI-Powered Development Environment

tool.name: Cursor IDE + Context7 MCP + Claude Integration

stages.instructions: Set up advanced AI development environment with Cursor IDE, Context7 MCP server integration, and Claude API for enhanced migration assistance

ai_prompts.cursor_ide_setup:
Configure Cursor IDE for React migration project:

```bash
# Install Cursor IDE (if not installed)
# Download from https://cursor.com

# Create .cursor directory
mkdir -p .cursor

# Configure workspace settings
cat > .cursor/settings.json << 'EOF'
{
  "typescript.preferences.preferTypeOnlyAutoImports": true,
  "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
    "source.organizeImports": true,
    "source.fixAll.eslint": true
  },
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
  "typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always"
}
EOF
```
ai_prompts.cursor_migration_rules:
Create comprehensive .cursorrules for React migration:

```
# React 14 â†’ Next.js 15 Migration Assistant

## Core Migration Principles
- Convert class components to function components with hooks
- Use Next.js App Router patterns (app/ directory)
- Implement Server Components for data fetching
- Use TypeScript strict mode with proper typing
- Replace Redux with Zustand for state management
- Migrate React Router to Next.js routing

## Component Migration Rules
1. Class Component â†’ Function Component:
   - componentDidMount â†’ useEffect
   - componentDidUpdate â†’ useEffect with dependencies
   - componentWillUnmount â†’ useEffect cleanup
   - setState â†’ useState

2. Next.js 15 Patterns:
   - Use 'use client' directive for client components
   - Implement async Server Components for data fetching
   - Use proper metadata API for SEO

3. TypeScript Best Practices:
   - Define proper interface types for props
   - Use generic types for reusable components
   - Implement proper error boundaries

## AI Commands
- /migrate-component: Convert React 14 component to Next.js 15
- /add-types: Add TypeScript types to JavaScript code
- /optimize-bundle: Suggest bundle optimization strategies
```

ai_prompts.cursor_cicd_pipeline:
Set up CI/CD pipeline:

```yaml
# .github/workflows/deploy.yml
name: Deploy to Production

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run lint
      - run: npm run test
      - run: npm run build

  lighthouse:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: test
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run build
      - run: npx lhci autorun

  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [test, lighthouse]
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: amondnet/vercel-action@v20
        with:
          vercel-token: ${{ secrets.VERCEL_TOKEN }}
          vercel-org-id: ${{ secrets.ORG_ID }}
          vercel-project-id: ${{ secrets.PROJECT_ID }}
          vercel-args: '--prod'
```
